item.title: Help i need someone to tell me how to set max players on server
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Rightâ€¦ let me see.

Whack open PlayerHandler.java and search for:

public static final int maxPlayers =

You should see:

// by making use of a hash table maybe based on map regions (8x8 granularity should be ok) public static final int maxPlayers = 200; public static Player players[] = new Player[maxPlayers]; public int playerSlotSearchStart = 1;

Edit the number after

	public static final int maxPlayers =

To change your max players.
